name: above all
trans: phrase. 尤其是 / 最重要的是

detailed_translations.english: most important of all; especially

sentences.english: According to the police, his attackers beat him with a blunt instrument.
sentences.chinese: 按照警方的说法，袭击者用钝器击打他。

sentences.english: There is now widespread support for these proposals, according to a recent public opinion poll.
sentences.chinese: 根据最近的民意调查，目前人们普遍支持这些提议。

detailed_translations.english: as shown by something or stated by someone

sentences.english: The gene they discovered today doesn't account for all those cases.
sentences.chinese: 他们今天发现的那种基因解释不了所有的那些情况。

detailed_translations.english: If something accounts for a particular fact or situation, it causes or explains it

sentences.english: We should adapt to it.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须适应它。

sentences.english: How do you adapt to that, especially with the lack of resources there?
sentences.chinese: 你如何适应那种情况，特别是在缺乏资源的情况下？

sentences.english: But some warn that if they cannot adapt to the changing market they will "die of hunger".
sentences.chinese: 但也有一些人警告说，如果他们无法适应不断变化的市场，这些书摊终会“饿死”。

sentences.english: Eventually it all balances out and most people adjust to how their "new" body moves and works.
sentences.chinese: 不过最终，这一切都会达到平衡，多数人都适应‘新’身体的行动和运转方式。

sentences.english: What we’re seeing, they insist, is the dawning of a new life stage — a stage that all of us need to adjust to.
sentences.chinese: 他们坚持认为我们所见的是一个新生命阶段的开始——我们所有人都需要调整以适应这个阶段。

sentences.english: She nodded to agree with me.
sentences.chinese: 她点头同意了我的意见。

sentences.english: I do not agree with him.
sentences.chinese: 我不同意他的看法。

sentences.english: I myself agree with you, but I can't speak for my boss.
sentences.chinese: 我同意你的提议，可我的话并不能代表我的老板。

sentences.english: Does that mean we can go forward to visit those universes ahead of us?
sentences.chinese: 这是否意味着我们能够前进到在我们前面的那些宇宙里去拜访他们？

sentences.english: All in all, it had been one of the most miserable days of Henry’s life.
sentences.chinese: 总的说来，这是亨利一生中最痛苦的日子之一。

sentences.english: We didn’t see anyone all day, apart from a couple of kids on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 除了海滩上的几个小孩，我们一整天没见到什么人。

sentences.english: Apart from the ending, it’s a really good film.
sentences.chinese: 除了结局，这部电影真的不错。

detailed_translations.english: except for

sentences.english: The programme appeals to young children.
sentences.chinese: 这个节目受小孩子喜欢。

detailed_translations.chinese: （对某人）有吸引力；（使某人）感兴趣

sentences.english: We need to apply for planning permission to build a garage.
sentences.chinese: 我们建车库需要申请规划许可。

sentences.english: As a result, the bad thing has been turned into a good one.
sentences.chinese: 结果坏事变成了好事。

sentences.english: Life as a whole is better if you go slowly, and take the time to savor it, appreciate every moment. That’s the simplest reason to slow down.
sentences.chinese: 如果你行进的慢一些，生活就是完整的，会让你感觉更好，花时间去欣赏它，欣赏每一个时刻，这就是为什么要慢下来的最简单的原因。

sentences.english: In other words, when parts of the community go away for a while, which is inevitable on any long-lived project, the community as a whole has to be strong and diverse enough to survive.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，当社区的一部分人离开一段时间时（这在任何长期项目中都是必不可避免的），社区作为一个整体必须足够强壮和多样化才能生存。

sentences.english: problems associated with cancer treatment
sentences.chinese: 与癌症治疗有关的问题

detailed_translations.english: to be related to a particular subject, activity etc

name: as far as one is concerned

sentences.english: Remember, at least you have me.
sentences.chinese: 翀记住，至少你还有我。

sentences.english: You can do anything you want, but not everything at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 你可以完成你想要做的任何事，但你不可能同时完成所有的事。

sentences.english: But men process and express emotions differently than women, and they have no roadmap for how to combine the masculine requirement of being strong and emotional at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 但是，比起女人，男人处理和表达情感的方式很不同，他们对如何将男性对强壮和感情的的需求同时结合起来没有一个规划图。

sentences.english: How do we escape the stereotypes and yet fulfill them at the same time?
sentences.chinese: 我们如何才能跳出这一老套的模式，并同时能好好的完成它们？

sentences.english: You can name each window, and you can place a status bar at the bottom of each window to differentiate one from another.
sentences.chinese: 可以给每个窗口指定名称，还可以在每个窗口的底部显示一个状态栏以帮助区分窗口。

sentences.english: My wife found this at the bottom of the measure you borrowed yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我老婆在你昨天晚上借走的称底盘上发现了这个。

sentences.english: The pendulum swings back and forth.
sentences.chinese: 这就像单摆一样来回摆动。

sentences.english: As you are aware, a fee will be charged annually.
sentences.chinese: 正如你所知道的那样，每年都要收取一笔费用。

sentences.english: Don’t lie to her. She’s bound to find out.
sentences.chinese: 别骗她，她肯定会发现的。

sentences.english: This guy should be famous for scoring the first goal of the 2010 World Cup...
sentences.chinese: 这位哥们会因为打进了2010南非世界杯第一个进球而成名。。。。。。

sentences.english: This guy should be famous for scoring the first goal of the 2010 World Cup...but it's been overshadowed by the celebration.
sentences.chinese: 这位哥们会因为打进了2010南非世界杯第一个进球而成名。。。。。。但是他的光芒可能被进球庆祝夺走。

sentences.english: Managers and architects need to be familiar with the ideas in this article.
sentences.chinese: 管理人员和架构师需要熟悉这篇文章中涉及的概念。

sentences.english: And why should anyone be interested in listening to our cough?
sentences.chinese: 凭什么会有人感兴趣来听我们的咳嗽呢？

sentences.english: We would not be interested in human beings if we did not have the hope of someday meeting someone worse off than ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们没有在某天碰到某位比我们更糟糕的人，这种念头的话，我们还会对人类感兴趣吗？

sentences.english: Many people in the organization or community would be interested in these documents, so you need a way to manage such users and their access.
sentences.chinese: 组织或社区中的很多人都可能对这些文档感兴趣，所以需要有一种方式来管理那些用户和他们的访问。

sentences.english: This is because objects may be made up of other objects.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为对象可能是由其他对象构成的。

sentences.english: You are the pride of us , you will be proud of us in the future.
sentences.chinese: 你现在是我们的骄傲，我们将来才能是你的自豪。

sentences.english: Police believe that the same man is responsible for three other murders in the area.
sentences.chinese: 警方认为该地区其他三宗谋杀案也是此人所为。

sentences.english: I’m not satisfied with the way he cut my hair.
sentences.chinese: 我对他给我理的发型不满意。

sentences.english: Take a look at the desks around you to see how yours fits in, and bear in mind you can manipulate it to send out a certain message.
sentences.chinese: 看一下你周围的桌子来判断你的桌面情况有多高合适度，另外要记住你可以通过巧妙处理你的桌面来发出特定信号。

sentences.english: To me, protesting is standing up for what you believe in.
sentences.chinese: 对于我来说，抗议就是为了坚持你所信仰的东西。

sentences.english: They belong to someone.
sentences.chinese: 他们肯定属于某人。

sentences.english: We do not belong to it.
sentences.chinese: 我们不属于那一派。

sentences.english: But I do not value my good looks; I only like to have them because they belong to you, my dear, and that there may be at least one thing about me worth your having.
sentences.chinese: 但是我并不重视我的容貌，我还愿意拥有我的容貌，只是因为这容貌属于你，我亲爱的，只是因为我也许至少还有一样东西值得你拥有。

detailed_translations.english: if something belongs to someone, they own it

sentences.english: the rate at which the pension builds up
sentences.chinese: 养老金的增长速度

sentences.english: You have to build up trust.
sentences.chinese: 你必须建立起信任。

sentences.english: We met together by accident.
sentences.chinese: 我们偶然相会。

detailed_translations.english: in a way that is not planned or organized

sentences.english: He has called off the trip.
sentences.chinese: 他取消了这次旅行。

detailed_translations.english: If you call off an event that has been planned, you cancel it

sentences.english: People taking garlic supplements who did catch a cold also had a shorter duration of symptoms and a lower risk of reinfection.
sentences.chinese: 那些吃大蒜的人，他们有感冒症状的持续时间较短，并且传染的风险较低。

sentences.english: You can catch a cold or the flu at any time of year, but it's more prevalent in winter, when we spend more time in close proximity with other people (a.k.a. germ-bearers!) and in warmer, drier air.
sentences.chinese: 我们在一年中的任何时节都会患感冒或者流感，只是在我们与其他人更加亲近（又称为细菌承载体）而且是温暖、干燥的冬季里，这种疾病更加流行。

sentences.english: And if you’re afraid that you’ll catch a cold because someone in the office sneezes, your fear becomes a movement of your own mind that creates what you expect, what you fear and believe.
sentences.chinese: 如果因为办公室的某人打喷嚏，你担心你会患上感冒，那么，你的担心会变成你自己思想的一种趋势，造成你所预期、所担心、所坚信的事件最终发生。

sentences.english: She moved back home to care for her elderly parents.
sentences.chinese: 她搬回家住，好照料年迈的双亲。

detailed_translations.english: to look after sb who is sick, very old, very young, etc

sentences.english: The assistant carried on talking.
sentences.chinese: 那个助理接着谈了下去。

sentences.english: Her bravery has given him the will to carry on with his life and his work.
sentences.chinese: 她的勇气激发了他继续生活和工作下去的意愿。

sentences.english: His eldest son Joseph carried on his father's traditions.
sentences.chinese: 长子约瑟夫继承了他父亲的传统。

detailed_translations.english: If you carry on doing something, you continue to do it

sentences.english: A lot of the buildings are built very close to each other.＃
sentences.chinese: 很多建筑建造的彼此非常接近。

detailed_translations.english: almost; nearly

sentences.english: He came across the jawbone of a 4.5 million-year-old marsupial.
sentences.chinese: 他偶然发现了一个450万年前的有袋动物的颌骨。

detailed_translations.english: If you come across something or someone, you find them or meet them by chance

sentences.english: Filter out the noise and nonsense. Only concentrate on what you deeply desire.
sentences.chinese: 过滤掉噪音和胡言乱语，只全神贯注于你内心深处的向往。

sentences.english: The user name should consist of alphanumeric characters and be a valid structure for all systems within an organization so that each person only has one user name.
sentences.chinese: 用户名应该由字母数字字符组成，并且对于组织内部所有的系统都应该是有效的结构，以便每个人只使用一个用户名。

sentences.english: He cut down on coffee and cigarettes, and ate a balanced diet.
sentences.chinese: 他少喝咖啡，少抽烟，饮食均衡。

sentences.english: Car owners were asked to cut down travel.
sentences.chinese: 车主们被要求减少出行。

detailed_translations.english: If you cut down on something or cut down something, you use or do less of it

sentences.english: Mrs. Johnson cut off a generous piece of the meat.
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊太太切下一大块肉。

sentences.english: He threatened to cut my hair off.
sentences.chinese: 他威胁要剪掉我的头发。

detailed_translations.english: If you cut something off, you remove it with a knife or a similar tool

sentences.english: He's good at dealing with pressure.
sentences.chinese: 他善于应付压力。

detailed_translations.english: to solve a problem, perform a task, etc.

sentences.english: Some of them depend on what your program does.
sentences.chinese: 其中一些取决于您的程序要做什么。

sentences.english: It all depend on whether he like the boss or not.
sentences.chinese: 这完全取决于他是否喜欢这个老闆。

sentences.english: Now, if only these phones were smart enough to do the dishes.
sentences.chinese: 现在要是这些电话有足够的智能来清洗餐具该有多好。

sentences.english: A batch of things to do in an hour today may look like this: Clean your desk / answer today’s emails / do the dishes / make three calls / write a grocery shopping list for tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 今天在一个小时里的要做的一批事情就像是这样：清理你的桌子/回复今天的邮件/洗餐具/打三个电话/写明天去食品店的购物清单

sentences.english: Do you do homework every day?
sentences.chinese: 你们每天都做家庭作业吗？

sentences.english: The most common use of library computers by teenagers was to do homework.
sentences.chinese: 青少年利用图书馆计算机，多半是用来做家庭作业。

sentences.english: I dreamt of her last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我梦见她了。

sentences.english: Mary was painfully awakened from her dream of owning a house when she saw how much it cost.
sentences.chinese: 当玛丽知道房价昂贵时，她痛苦地从想拥有一座房子的梦想中醒悟了过来。

sentences.english: I should never dream of doing such a thing.
sentences.chinese: 我从未想到去干这样的事。

sentences.english: As the day goes on, the pollen dries up and becomes hard.
sentences.chinese: 随着日子一天天过去，花粉变得又干又硬。

detailed_translations.english: If something dries up or if something dries it up, it loses all its moisture and becomes completely dry and shrivelled or hard

sentences.english: The court of inquiry ruled that the crash was due to pilot error.
sentences.chinese: 调查法庭裁定飞机失事是由驾驶员的失误造成的。

sentences.english: She has been absent from work due to illness.
sentences.chinese: 她因病没去上班。

sentences.english: The restaurant’s success was due largely to its new manager.
sentences.chinese: 这家餐馆的成功很大程度上归功于新来的经理。

sentences.english: Attendance at the meeting was small, due in part to (= partly because of ) the absence of teachers.
sentences.chinese: 参加会议的人数不多，部分原因是教师缺席。

detailed_translations.english: because of something

name: expose oneself to sth.
trans: phrase. 使自己接触，置身于……

sentences.english: Then figure out one practical solution you can take for each of those pieces.
sentences.chinese: 接着想出一个实用性的方法用于解决每一小部分的问题。

sentences.english: Fill out the application carefully, and keep copies of it.
sentences.chinese: 仔细填写申请表，并保留备份。

detailed_translations.english: If you fill out a form or other document requesting information, you write information in the spaces on it

sentences.english: People from the church would come by my trailer from time to time to tell me they were still praying for me, and that they hoped I would come back to Jesus before I wound up in hell.
sentences.chinese: 教会的人时不时会到我的拖车上来，告诉我他们依然在为我祈祷，希望我不要在去往地狱的道路上越走越远，早日回到耶稣我主的身边。

sentences.english: Sometimes going over the top is good, if you can let yourself go from time to time, people will notice.
sentences.chinese: 有时挣脱束缚是好的，如果你能够让自己一次又一次地挣脱束缚，人们会注意到你的。

sentences.english: All of those advantages, for sure.
sentences.chinese: 所有的那些优势，的确。

sentences.english: But one thing is for sure, traveling will be much easier from now on, as I can leave whenever I want without having to juggle rent, the dog, and, well, stuff.
sentences.chinese: 但有一点我确信的是，以后的旅行将会变得更加容易。 因为只要我想，我可以随时启程，我不会再让房租，狗，这种琐事填满我的脑子。

name: get into shape
trans: phrase. 变得健康 / 适合

sentences.english: A: Yeah.But it’s easy to get lost in the forest and compass is useless there.
sentences.chinese: 是的。 但那里的森林很容易迷路，而且指南针在那儿派不上用场。

sentences.english: Of course, most men have no interest in being there and that is why they get lost in the aisles.
sentences.chinese: 当然了，大多数男人还是对在超市不感兴趣的，这也是为什么他们在过道都会迷路的原因。

sentences.english: It might seem impossible to get lost in the modern world with its ubiquity of digital maps, but there is more than one way to be lost.
sentences.chinese: 在这个到处都有电子地图的现代世界，迷路恐怕不太可能发生了，但我们还是有不只一种会导致迷失的方法。

sentences.english: Asshole...I should be in-charge because I get rid of your waste.
sentences.chinese: 忍了吧。。。） ：‘我应该负责，因为我可以摆脱掉你们所有的垃圾。’

sentences.english: Americans want to get rid of the deficit, they want smaller government, but they want bigger benefits from government.
sentences.chinese: 美国人想摆脱赤字，想拥有一个更小的政府，但他们更想从政府那获得更大的好处。

name: get used to doing sth./sth.
trans: phrase. 习惯于做某事 / 某事

sentences.english: He was giving his collection away for free.
sentences.chinese: 他正在无偿捐赠他的收藏。

sentences.english: She would give nothing away.
sentences.chinese: 她什么也不会泄露。

detailed_translations.english: If you give away something that you own, you give it to someone, rather than selling it, often because you no longer want it.

name: give sb. a lift
trans: phrase. 让某人搭车，送一程

sentences.english: The radiator gives out a lot of heat.
sentences.chinese: 散热器释放出大量的热。

sentences.english: There were people at the entrance giving out leaflets.
sentences.chinese: 有人在入口处分发传单。

detailed_translations.english: to produce sth such as heat, light, etc.

sentences.english: We did not give way to bitterness.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有给苦难和怨恨让路。

detailed_translations.english: to stop resisting sb/sth; to agree to do sth that you do not want to do

sentences.english: Then the fire alarm went off. I just grabbed my clothes and ran out.
sentences.chinese: 之后火警响了，我只抓起衣服就跑了出去。

detailed_translations.english: If an alarm bell goes off, it makes a sudden loud noise

sentences.english: If it rains, I won’t go cycling.
sentences.chinese: 如果下雨，我就不去骑车了。

sentences.english: What do you do on Monday? I go cycling.
sentences.chinese: 你星期一做什么？ 我去骑自行车。

sentences.english: B: If I go cycling, I'll be tired by the evening.
sentences.chinese: 如果我去骑车的话，晚上我肯定会很累了。

sentences.english: I usually go shopping with my aunt.
sentences.chinese: 我通常和我阿姨一起去购物。

sentences.english: I often go swimming on weekday.
sentences.chinese: 我经常在周日去游泳。

sentences.english: Where do you go swimming?
sentences.chinese: 你们去哪里游泳呢？

sentences.english: Your grandparents go swimming every day?
sentences.chinese: 你祖父母每天去游泳吗？

sentences.english: Interest rates went up.
sentences.chinese: 利率上涨了。

sentences.english: The cost has gone up to $1.95 a minute.
sentences.chinese: 价格已涨到了一分钟$1.95。

detailed_translations.english: If a price, amount, or level goes up, it becomes higher or greater than it was

name: have trouble (in) doing sth.
trans: phrase. 在做某事上有困难

name: have difficulty (in) doing sth.
trans: phrase. 在做某事上有困难

sentences.english: If there is any change about the time of the meeting, please notify us in advance.
sentences.chinese: 开会时间如有变， 请提前告诉我们。

sentences.english: Hungry beggars roamed the streets in search of food.
sentences.chinese: 饥饿的乞丐在街上徘徊寻找食物。

sentences.english: Some tribes migrate with their cattle in search of fresh grass.
sentences.chinese: 一些部落为寻找嫩草带着他们的牲口迁徙。

sentences.english: The geological prospecting team ranged over the desert in search of valuable deposits of oil.
sentences.chinese: 地质勘探队走遍了这片沙漠，寻找有开采价值的油层。

sentences.english: We went out in spite of the rain.
sentences.chinese: 尽管下着雨，我们还是出去了。

sentences.english: In general, all of these hosts can be different.
sentences.chinese: 一般地，所有的这些主机都可以是不同的。

sentences.english: If you're in a hurry, you might nod curtly and be on your way; but you could decide to take your time, smile back and repeat the message before you go.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在匆忙赶路，可能只是简单地点头，然后继续赶路；但是你也可能决定花点时间，在走之前回她一个微笑，重复这个祝福。

sentences.english: On the back—in pencil, for some reason; he must have been in a hurry—he wrote, “Sweetheart!
sentences.chinese: 在明信片的背面——不知怎么的，他一定是很匆忙，用铅笔——他写道，“宝贝！

sentences.english: "Then can I have one answer in return?" he demanded.
sentences.chinese: “那么，作为回报我要索取一个回答咯？” 他要求道。

sentences.english: And in return for an acknowledgment, which must give me some pain, you cannot deny me the privilege of disliking him as much as ever.
sentences.chinese: 不过，这种应承肯定会给我带来痛苦，作为对我的报答，你不能剥夺我可以一如既往地不喜欢他的权利。

detailed_translations.english: as a way of thanking sb or paying them for sth they have done

sentences.english: He calmed down in the end.
sentences.chinese: 他的情绪终于平定下来。

sentences.english: There really is no time like the present, and if you miss it…well…we all go away in the end.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，没有其他时间像是现在一样，如果你错过了现在……那么……我们最后都会死去。

sentences.english: We will examine each of these methods in turn.
sentences.chinese: 我们将按照顺序依次分析这些方法。

sentences.english: This, in turn, would require changes to all users of those interfaces.
sentences.chinese: 依次的，这需要那些接口的所有用户作出相应的改变。

sentences.english: The first involved asking users to keep a diary of how they searched while they watched television--the assumption being that those searches would likely be more entertainment-focused.
sentences.chinese: 第一项让用户对自己每天看电视时是如何搜索的进行日记，即假设那些搜索可能更倾向于以娱乐为重点。

sentences.english: They also had to keep a diary of their habits, including their sleep patterns and stress levels.
sentences.chinese: 他们也要写关于他们习惯的日记，包括他们的睡眠类型和压力程度。

sentences.english: As part of the research, 63 families were asked to keep a diary of their use of communications technology.
sentences.chinese: 作为调查的一部分，研究人员请63个家庭保留他们每日使用通讯技术的记录。

sentences.english: Grace laid out the knives and forks on the table.
sentences.chinese: 格雷丝把刀叉摆放在桌子上。

detailed_translations.english: If you lay out a group of things, you spread them out and arrange them neatly, for example, so that they can all be seen clearly

sentences.english: But the changes do not always lead to cataracts.
sentences.chinese: 但这些变化并不总是会导致白内障。

sentences.english: This can lead to significant distress, but have no fear!
sentences.chinese: 这可能导致巨大的压力，但是不要害怕！

sentences.english: In this case, requests from one service policy which demand excessive CPU and lead to overload could result in breached service goals for the other policy or for both policies.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，一个服务策略中的请求需要过多 CPU 资源，这会导致过载，进而导致另一个策略或这两个策略的服务目标被破坏。

sentences.english: I love looking after the children.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢照顾孩子们。

detailed_translations.english: If you look after someone or something, you do what is necessary to keep them healthy, safe, or in good condition

sentences.english: "What should I look for"?
sentences.chinese: 是要我寻找什么吗？

sentences.english: Not only this will happen but you will also look for his slightest mistakes then use them as proofs for what you have been told about him!!
sentences.chinese: 不仅这个将会发生，而且你也会寻找他最轻微的错误，然后将此作为他人告诉你他是怎么样的人的证据。

sentences.english: " so we can look for those features.
sentences.chinese: 这样我们就可以寻找那些特征。

sentences.english: He was looking forward to working with the new manager.
sentences.chinese: 他很期待和新经理一起工作。

sentences.english: He now says that he's looking forward to increased trade after the war.
sentences.chinese: 他现在说他正期盼着战后的贸易增长。

detailed_translations.english: If you look forward to something that is going to happen, you want it to happen because you think you will enjoy it

sentences.english: You're a popular girl, Grace, and a lot of the younger ones look up to you.
sentences.chinese: 你是个受欢迎的女孩，格雷丝，许多比你小的女孩都仰慕你。

detailed_translations.english: If you look up to someone, especially someone older than you, you respect and admire them

sentences.english: "If you want to lose weight, turn off the television or watch something boring," he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，“如果你想减肥，那就把电视机关了，或者看一些无聊的节目。”

sentences.english: In the meantime, I sit on some committees and study part time for a masters degree, and I make an effort to enjoy every bird and tree I see, and every moment with family and friends.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，我还继续担当一些委员会的代表并通过业余时间的学习去获得硕士学位。 我努力享受着每天看到的每一棵树每一只鸟，与家人和朋友在一起的每一个时刻。

sentences.english: Given these findings, employers should "make an effort to reduce the effects of bias toward attractive people in the workplace," say University of Florida researchers.
sentences.chinese: 佛罗里达大学的研究人员就此表示，雇主们应努力减少在工作中以貌取人的偏见带来的影响。

sentences.english: Whatever she did, it made no difference. ＃
sentences.chinese: 不管她做什么都没有用。

detailed_translations.english: to have an important effect or influence on something or someone

sentences.english: That, I believe, is what God asks of us --- not “Be perfect”, not “Don’t even make a mistake”, but “Be whole”.
sentences.chinese: 我相信这就是上帝对我们的期望：不求“完美”，也不求“从来不犯错误”，而是追求人生的“完整”。

sentences.english: Now, you think you can make a mistake on your exam, take a look at this up here at tell me what that all is. I have no idea.
sentences.chinese: 你觉得你可以在考试的时候犯错误，看一看这之前写的东西,能告诉我这些是什么，我也不知道。

sentences.english: When you do make a mistake, think about all of the possible solutions, so that when you tell someone, you can suggest ways to fix it.
sentences.chinese: 如果真的犯了错误，想一想可能的解决方法，这样你在跟别人说的时候就可以提出解决它的建议。

sentences.english: One way to avoid all this is to make a list of simple values that you want to incorporate into your next career.
sentences.chinese: 避免所有这些的一个办法是，列个清单，列出你想要融入到下一份职业中的简单的价值观念。

sentences.english: I guess farming is about the cleanest way to make a living.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得经营农场大约是最清洁的一种谋生方式了。

sentences.english: Yes, we need to make a living, but making a living doesn’t mean selling — it means living.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我们确实需要生存，但生存并不意味着一定要买卖什么，它应该是一种生活。

sentences.english: He had been a smart boy, even talented in languages and mathematics, but his mother knew these were no way to make a living.
sentences.chinese: 他小时候很聪明，甚至在语言学和数学方面有些天分，可是他的母亲知道这些东西不能拿来谋生。

sentences.english: Now I can go anywhere and make friends and find family.
sentences.chinese: 现在我可以去任何地方，结交朋友，寻找家人。

sentences.english: Everyone needs friends, and if you fail to make friends, you should examine yourself and see if there is something wrong with your personality.
sentences.chinese: 人人都需要朋友，若你在交朋友方面总是失败，就该反省自己，看是否你的个性有什么问题。

sentences.english: The team slowly made their way back to base.
sentences.chinese: 球队慢慢地返回基地。

sentences.english: I make sure they work well.
sentences.chinese: 我要确认他们做得很好。

sentences.english: And you have to make sure, what I always say.
sentences.chinese: 所以我经常说，你要确保良好的工作环境。

sentences.english: Then, make sure that you and your spouse share these goals with each other.
sentences.chinese: 尽可能具体地说，就是确保你和你的配偶彼此共享这些目标。

sentences.english: It all started to make sense.
sentences.chinese: 这一切都开始变得有意义。

sentences.english: It says that on average, you should be around 20.
sentences.chinese: 它表示的是平均值，应该在20左右。

sentences.english: You are only on this earth for around 80 years, on average, if you are lucky, so why not try and experience as much as you can before you die.
sentences.chinese: 平均来说，如果你幸运的话，你仅仅会在这地球活上大概80年。 所以为什么不试着在你死之前经历尽可能多的经历呢。

sentences.english: We might not have the best scores on average, but our institutions have some of the brightest minds in the world.
sentences.chinese: 也许平均下来我们得不到最好的分数，但是我们的研究院有着世界上最聪明的头脑。

sentences.english: The regulations were out of date and confusing.
sentences.chinese: 那些规定已经过时，而且令人费解。

detailed_translations.english: Something that is out of date is old-fashioned and no longer useful

sentences.english: out-of-work actors
sentences.chinese: 待业的演员

sentences.english: He’s been out of work for six months.
sentences.chinese: 他已经失业六个月了。

detailed_translations.english: unemployed

sentences.english: She was going over to her parents' house to pick up some clean clothes for Oskar.
sentences.chinese: 她正要去父母家为奥斯卡取几件干净的衣服。

detailed_translations.english: When you pick up someone or something that is waiting to be collected, you go to the place where they are and take them away, often in a car

sentences.english: He or she will then show you how all these things, combined, play a role in choosing a career.
sentences.chinese: 然后他/她会向你解释如何将这些事情结合起来，在你择业时发挥作用。

sentences.english: I think this may be an extraordinary moment in history where Africa can become a continent of hope and the Bank can play a role in that.
sentences.chinese: 他说："我认为，这可能是历史上一个不同寻常的时刻，使非洲成为一个希望的大陆，世行可以在这方面发挥作用。

sentences.english: We learned to play the piano by playing and drive a car by driving.
sentences.chinese: 我们以弹来学习弹钢琴，以驾驶来学习驾驶汽车。

sentences.english: Organizers of "Britain's Most Talented Pet" say they have found a dog that can mow the lawn and play the piano, the Daily Telegraph reported.
sentences.chinese: 据英国《每日电讯报》近日报道，"英国最有才华宠物"节目的组织者说，他们发现了一只既会除草又会弹钢琴的宠物狗。

sentences.english: So, despite not really knowing how to play the piano and not knowing how to read or write music, Cicoria got himself a piano and promptly began to play everything he heard in his head.
sentences.chinese: 于是，尽管实际上不知道该如何弹钢琴，也不知道如何读写乐谱，西科里拉还是给自己买了一台钢琴，并且立即开始弹奏脑子里听到的一切。

sentences.english: Women who put off having a baby often make the best mothers.
sentences.chinese: 晚育的妇女常常会成为最佳母亲。

detailed_translations.english: If you put something off, you delay doing it

sentences.english: They had put up with behaviour from their son which they would not have tolerated from anyone else.
sentences.chinese: 他们容忍了自己儿子的行为，而换作别的任何人，他们才不会容忍。

detailed_translations.english: If you put up with something, you tolerate or accept it, even though you find it unpleasant or unsatisfactory

sentences.english: In his speech, he referred to a recent trip to Canada.
sentences.chinese: 在他的讲话中，他提到了最近的加拿大之行。

sentences.english: He gave the speech without referring to his notes.
sentences.chinese: 他脱稿发表了演讲。

detailed_translations.english: to mention or speak about someone or something

sentences.english: Therefore, we are not to rely on feelings, but to have faith in the facts.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我们不能依靠我们的感觉，而是要将信心建立在事实上。

sentences.english: But what of the resources we rely on to sustain and develop our technology?
sentences.chinese: 但是我们依靠什么资源来支持和发展我们的科技？

sentences.english: However, many objects rely on other objects or layers of infrastructure.
sentences.chinese: 然而，许多对象依赖基础结构的其它对象或层。

sentences.english: This will result in output containing both the starting and ending addresses of the compiled code for each method.
sentences.chinese: 这将会导致在输出结果中包含每个方法已编译的代码的起始地址和结束地址。

sentences.english: This meeting should result in some change in how they work for the coming sprints, because they work to continually improve their team and practice effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 这个会议会导致迎接下一个冲刺阶段所做工作的一些转变，因为他们会不断工作以提高团队的实践效率。

sentences.english: In this case, requests from one service policy which demand excessive CPU and lead to overload could result in breached service goals for the other policy or for both policies.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，一个服务策略中的请求需要过多 CPU 资源，这会导致过载，进而导致另一个策略或这两个策略的服务目标被破坏。

sentences.english: The two sides agreed to set up a commission to investigate claims.
sentences.chinese: 双方同意成立一个委员会，调查索赔问题。

sentences.english: ...an organization which sets up meetings about issues of interest to women.
sentences.chinese: …一个安排有关妇女利益问题的会议组织。

detailed_translations.english: If you set something up, you create or arrange it

sentences.english: All right, there's no need to show off.
sentences.chinese: 好啦，没有必要炫耀了。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone is showing off, you are criticizing them for trying to impress people by showing in a very obvious way what they can do or what they own

sentences.english: You will need to slow down for a while.
sentences.chinese: 你将会需要放松一会儿。

detailed_translations.english: If someone slows down or if something slows them down, they become less active

sentences.english: India and Nepal have sorted out their trade and security dispute.
sentences.chinese: 印度和尼泊尔已经解决了他们的贸易和安全争端。

detailed_translations.english: If you sort out a problem or the details of something, you do what is necessary to solve the problem or organize the details

sentences.english: You notice that your breathing has speeded up a bit.
sentences.chinese: 你注意到你的呼吸已加快了一点。

detailed_translations.english: When something speeds up or when you speed it up, it moves or travels faster

sentences.english: So I decided to spend time in this village.
sentences.chinese: 所以我决定花时间在这个村子里。

sentences.english: At this stage in your life you can spend time on yourself without all the guilt.
sentences.chinese: 在你生命的这个时间里，你可以花时间做自己的事而不必有罪恶感。

sentences.english: I should go and see a doctor straight away.
sentences.chinese: 我应该立即去看医生。

detailed_translations.english: If you do something straight away, you do it immediately and without delay

sentences.english: Why do people suffer from phobias?
sentences.chinese: 人们为什么会遭受恐惧？

sentences.english: If you suffer from these problems you can file them down with a pumice stone.
sentences.chinese: 如果你遭受这些问题，你可以用一块磨脚石把它锉去。

sentences.english: For instance, if your organization focuses on results and ignores how to achieve those results, it's likely that the group will suffer from low trust and consequently low morale.
sentences.chinese: 例如，如果你的组织集中在结果上，而忽略如何达到这些结果，这些组织很可能遭受比较低的信任，因此有比较低的士气。

sentences.english: I always used to laugh to myself when I heard people say that we need to take care of ourselves in order to be able to take care of others.
sentences.chinese: 我听到一些人说要照顾好我们自己，这样我们才有能力去照顾好别人。 不知道为什么，当我听到这句话的时候，我经常笑我自己。

sentences.english: Because the office refrigerator is unowned by any individual, no one feels responsibility to take care of it, and certainly no one wants to take time out of his or her busy workday to do so.
sentences.chinese: 办公室里的冰箱因为不属于任何一个个人，没有人觉得自己有责任去管理或者照顾它，当然也没人在繁忙的工作时间抽出时间去做那些事情。

sentences.english: I did just have to take a deep breath and push the publish button regardless of the fear.
sentences.chinese: 我实在只需要深呼吸一口，然后不管什么恐惧，点一下发布按钮就好了。

sentences.english: Get it out of your system. Then take a deep breath and consider how evolution affected a few specific body parts, and why.
sentences.chinese: 把它从你的思绪中去掉然后深呼吸，现在来考虑进化是如何影响一些特殊的身体器官以及为什么。

sentences.english: Instead, take the time to go outside and really observe nature, take a deep breath of fresh air, enjoy the serenity of water and greenery.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，我们应该抽出时间到户外走走，观赏自然美景，深深呼吸新鲜空气，享受泉水和草木的宁静。

sentences.english: Our suggestion: Insist that everyone take a shower before hitting the pool. And make it a warm one.
sentences.chinese: 我们的建议是：坚持保证每个人入水前都先去冲个淋浴，而且要是热水的。

sentences.english: Just take it easy and tell us what happened.
sentences.chinese: 别急，告诉我们发生了什么事。

sentences.english: We eventually took off at 11 o'clock and arrived in Juneau at 1:30.
sentences.chinese: 我们终于在11点起飞，1:30到达朱诺。

sentences.english: He took off at once and headed back to the motel.
sentences.chinese: 他出人意料地立刻就离开了，然后回到了那家汽车旅馆。

detailed_translations.chinese: 中文释义:（飞机等）起飞；匆忙离开
detailed_translations.english: When an aeroplane takes off, it leaves the ground and starts flying

sentences.english: I'm going to take over the company one day.
sentences.chinese: 我总有一天会接管这家公司。

detailed_translations.english: If you take over a company, you get control of it, for example, by buying its shares

sentences.english: Subjects or participants - Who will take part in your study ?
sentences.chinese: 研究对象或参与者――谁将会参与你的研究？

sentences.english: Students should do surveys, visit museums, take part in charity work and hand in reports for teachers to decide on their marks.
sentences.chinese: 学生应该通过做调查，参观博物馆，参加公益劳动，上交给老师的这些活动的报告，决定他们的成绩。

sentences.english: Synchronous serve and asynchronous receive can be particularly useful in cases where external clients take part in application processing by sending messages to the application.
sentences.chinese: 如果外部客户端通过向应用程序发送消息来参与应用程序处理，同步服务和异步接收将尤为有用。

detailed_translations.english: to be involved in sth

sentences.english: That's why a lot of us like the idea of living on the edge: It's in our DNA to take risks.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么我们许多人有喜欢过惊险刺激的生活这种想法：冒险就在人的DNA中。

sentences.english: Teachers can help them learn to take risks in an atmosphere where they feel confident about doing so.
sentences.chinese: 教师可以帮助他们在一定的环境中冒险，使她们因为这么做而感到自信。

name: take things for granted
trans: phrase. 视某事为理所当然

sentences.english: I know how busy you must be and naturally I wouldn't want to take up too much of your time.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你一定很忙，当然我不想占用你太多的时间。

sentences.english: A good deal of my time is taken up with driving the children to soccer games.
sentences.chinese: 我的许多时间都用在开车送孩子们去参加足球比赛。

detailed_translations.english: If something takes up a particular amount of time, space, or effort, it uses that amount

sentences.english: a complex and time-consuming process
sentences.chinese: 复杂而费时的过程

detailed_translations.english: taking a long time to do

sentences.english: In every beginning think of the end.
sentences.chinese: 凡事开头时就要想到它的后果。

sentences.english: We can think about why that would be.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以考虑一下为什么会是那样。

sentences.english: I never throw anything away.
sentences.chinese: 我从来不扔任何东西。

detailed_translations.english: When you throw away or throw out something that you do not want, you get rid of it, for example, by putting it in a rubbish container

sentences.english: He kept turning the central heating down.
sentences.chinese: 他不断地调低中央暖气系统的温度。

detailed_translations.english: When you turn down a radio, heater, or other piece of equipment, you reduce the amount of sound or heat being produced, by adjusting the controls

sentences.english: They waited for an impossible dream to turn real, for a demon to turn into an angel.
sentences.chinese: 他们期望一个不可能的美梦变成现实，期望一个魔鬼能变成天使。

sentences.english: So fat will never turn into muscle.
sentences.chinese: 所以脂肪永远不会变成肌肉。

sentences.english: The light's a bit too harsh. You can turn it off.
sentences.chinese: 那灯光有点太刺眼。你可以关掉它。

detailed_translations.english: When you turn off a piece of equipment or a supply of something, you stop heat, sound, or water from being produced by adjusting the controls

sentences.english: I want to turn on the television.
sentences.chinese: 我想打开电视机。

detailed_translations.english: When you turn on a piece of equipment or a supply of something, you cause heat, sound, or water to be produced by adjusting the controls

sentences.english: They finally turned up at nearly midnight.
sentences.chinese: 他们终于在近午夜时出现了。

sentences.english: Richard had turned up on Christmas Eve with Tony.
sentences.chinese: 理查德在圣诞前夜与托尼一起出现。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone or something turns up, you mean that they arrive unexpectedly or after you have been waiting a long time

name: to the best of my knowledge

sentences.english: Shall we eat out or stay in? It's up to you.
sentences.chinese: 咱们是到外面吃饭还是待在家里？你决定吧。

detailed_translations.english: to be for sb to decide

sentences.english: He used to go to our school.
sentences.chinese: 他曾在我们学校就读。

sentences.english: We’re eating out more often than we used to.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在出去吃饭的次数比以前多了。

detailed_translations.english: if something used to happen, it happened regularly or all the time in the past, but does not happen now

sentences.english: You can go to bed with one view and wake up with another.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在一种景色相伴下入眠，而醒来看到的是另一种景色。

sentences.english: Maybe you’re dreaming me; maybe we only exist in each other’s dreams and every morning when we wake up we forget all about each other.
sentences.chinese: 也许是你梦到了我；也许我们只存在于对方的梦里，每天早晨当我们醒来时我们就忘了和对方有关的一切。

sentences.english: In an hour the drivers will be warming up for the main event.
sentences.chinese: 一小时后车手们要为主赛做热身运动。

detailed_translations.english: If you warm up for an event such as a race, you prepare yourself for it by doing exercises or by practicing just before it starts

sentences.english: Negotiators are due to meet later today to work out a compromise.
sentences.chinese: 谈判者们预定在今天晚些时候会面以找到一个折中的办法。

sentences.english: It took me some time to work out what was causing this.
sentences.chinese: 它花了我一些时间，找到导致这种状况的原因。

sentences.english: Things just didn't work out as planned.
sentences.chinese: 事情没有像计划的那样进展顺利。

detailed_translations.english: If you work out a solution to a problem or mystery, you manage to find the solution by thinking or talking about it
